summary: This document provides information regarding the storage and maintenance of call detail records by T-Mobile USA and Metro PCS, specifically focusing on the use of Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) for timestamps. It outlines how records are stored in different formats and the implications for legal demands regarding call records.
keyFacts: T-Mobile USA and Metro PCS store call detail records in various formats.
Current call detail records are maintained in Coordinated Universal Time (UTC).
Older records are stored in the time zone associated with the user's location at the time of the call.
The document includes instructions for converting UTC timestamps to local time.
Contact information for inquiries regarding the records is provided.
